revtext: The products here are of premium quality. The staff is cordial. The manager there , Mrs Priti has been very helpful in giving the right tips on how to use and maintain the products. This is a genuine review by an existing client , so for those who are still thinking wether or not to buy products here, this store is definitely a reliable one.
revreply: Thank you for kind words and appreciation. Our staff are indeed geared up to ensure we make a difference in people\'s lives. We are very proud of Priti for doing an excellent work
